title: WTB: Looking to get some raw T206s to start the monster
author: jackstraw

posts.post_title: WTB: Looking to get some raw T206s to start the monster
posts.post_content:
Wanted to start building a T206 collection and this site seems like a good place to start. I'm not looking to break the bank right now, I have about $100 allotted to start this off. I'd be interested in small lots of cards or singles for higher grade cards or star/HOF cards.

Thanks!

You've reached Mecca for baseball card collectors.

I'll email or pm you with some T206's I have available.

Good luck!

[quote name="jackstraw" post=1809212]Wanted to start building a T206 collection and this site seems like a good place to start. I'm not looking to break the bank right now, I have about $100 allotted to start this off. I'd be interested in small lots of cards or singles for higher grade cards or star/HOF cards.

Thanks![/QUOTE]


Welcome!

I am mainly a buyer, and I do agree, this site is a great place to get cards. Good luck on your quest.
